document_data.name: Kaestra Karanok
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaestra Karanok''' was the most powerful cleric of [[Entropy]] (in truth [[Tiamat]]) in [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kaestra was the nominal head of all religious activities of [[House Karanok]].
document_data.History: Early in the [[1374 DR|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], the priestess of [[Loviatar]] [[Ythnel Duumin]] and survivors of the defeated [[Mage Society]] rebels escaped to [[Mordulkin]] went back to Luthcheq to sabotage the [[witchweed]] supplies to pave the way for an invasion; they did that and slew Kaestra as well, on [[Midwinter]].<ref name="MoP" >
document_data.Relationship: Kaestra was daughter of [[Jaerios Karanok]] and twin sister of [[Saestra Karanok]].
